text: How long are the expiry's on the Letsencrypt certificates that HubSpot uses. The expiry date is getting flagged in the clients SEO site auditing tool because it expires in 2 days. Should I just ignore it and it will refresh?
I was seeing previously the Forms API created company as well as contact upon form submission but I just encountered a situation where this is not the case
what may have been the reason for not creating the company record as well?

Hi guys, I got a question about the 'topic / tag' URL of a blog. We created a custom blog listing that uses the topics to filter the blog overview. With our default blog, the url always contains `/topic/` but with all new blogs we create using the same template the url contains `/tag/` instead. Is this an update in HubSpot or am I missing a setting somewhere?

<https://blog.layertec.nl/topic/toepassingen-3d-printers>
<https://blog.layertec.be/tag/toepassingen-3d-printers>
Do you have the “automatically create company for contact”-setting turned on?
